mapper.select: SELECT * FROM course_attendance WHERE DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 20 MINUTE)>(SELECT begin_time FROM course_detail WHERE course_detail.id = course_attendance.course_id) AND (SELECT end_time FROM course_detail WHERE course_detail.id = course_attendance.course_id) > NOW() AND student_id=#{studentId}

select student.no As studentNo, student.name As studentName, course_detail.week As week, course_detail.weekday As weekday, course_attendance.status As status From course_attendance JOIN student ON course_attendance.student_id = student.id JOIN course_detail on course_detail.id = course_attendance.course_id WHERE course_detail.course_name=#{courseName} And student.no=#{studentNo} And course_detail.semester=#{semester} And course_detail.course_teacher=#{teaUserid}
